elements.label: Forbidden, on Pain of Death
elements.comments: Never give anything this aspect. It is a fundamental assumption and REQUIREMENT that nothing ever have this aspect. Originally created for reasons that hopefully don't exist anymore.

elements.label: Heals Sickness
elements.description: I can use this to help me recover from illness.
Something I can't talk to a follower about
elements.comments: This aspect prevents the element from being placed in the Talk verb when beginning to speak with a follower.

elements.description: Something I can talk to a follower about
elements.comments: This aspect allows the element to be placed in the Talk verb when beginning to speak with a follower. Probably should've been named modded_follower_talk_allowed, or modded_talktofollower_allowed.
Originally created for reasons that hopefully don't exist anymore.

elements.label: Heals Sickness
elements.description: I can use this to help me recover from illness.

elements.comments: If you think you need this, get in contact with SarahK. Originally created for reasons that hopefully don't exist anymore.
For when you wanna do the thing, but not that badly, I guess. Originally created for reasons that hopefully don't exist anymore.
So that your mentors will actually do stuff.
When in the Verb, prevents vanilla dating.
When in the Verb, prevents vanilla talktofollower.

elements.label: Heals Hunger
elements.description: I can use this to help me recover from hunger.

elements.comments: This is a recipe aspect for turning Health into Hunger.

elements.label: Mutated!
elements.description: This card has been mutated via the modded_mutate recipe and Verb accessible through the console.
elements.comments: This aspect exists to help modders test mutations and XTriggers.
